title: Stop being lazy and fix your buggy ass client.
body:
This happens to me at least twice a week, where I go to close the game client, open it up 30 minutes later and then it tells this:

"We're going to restore you to a previous patch"

https://i.imgur.com/Ae24YpE.png

Or whatever the fuck it says, then it gets stuck on 100% for 15 god damn minutes.
